Name: Accelerate
Description: Greatly increases the agility of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Acceleratle
Description: Increases the agility of all allies for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Anchorman
Description: Acts after everyone else to inflict extreme impact damage on the enemy.

Name: Assassin's Stab
Description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally causes instant death.

Name: Attack Attacker
Description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally lowers its attack for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Bad Hand
Description: Inflicts outrageous dark-elemental damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Bang
Description: Inflicts minor explosive spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Beast Tamer
Description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the beast family.

Name: Big Banga
Description: Inflicts outrageous explosive damange on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Black Breath
Description: Inflicts major dark-elemental breath damage on all enemies and occasionally prevents them from casting spells for 2 to 5 turns

Name: Blessed Breath
Description: Inflicts major light-elemental breath damage on all enemies and occasionally confuses them for 2 to 5 turns

Name: Blightsplitter
Description: Inflicts medium dark-elemental slashing damage on all enemies.

Name: Blunt
Description: Greatly decreases the attack of a single enemy for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Boom
Description: Inflicts medium explosive spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Bounce
Description: Reflects most spells back at the caster for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Brake Wind
Description: Reflects breath attacks back at the enemy. Protects all allies once only.

Name: Brightsplitter
Description: Inflicts minor light-elemental slashing damage on all enemies.

Name: Buff
Description: Greatly increases the defence of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Burning Breath
Description: Lets out an exhalation of immobilisation that paralyses all enemies for 2 to 5 turns

Name: Butterfly Bop
Description: A dance that summons countless butterflies from the aether to attack all enemies. The higher the user's agility, the greter the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: C-C-Cold Breath
Description: Inflicts extreme ice-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

Name: Chilly Breath
Description: Inflicts medium ice-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

Name: Cock-a-Doodle-Doo
Description: Cures all allies of sleep.

Name: Confusion Attack
Description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally confuses it for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Cool Breath
Description: Inflicts minor ice-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

Name: Crack
Description: Inflicts minor ice-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Crackle
Description: Inflicts medium ice-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Crag
Description: Inflicts minor earth-elemental spell damage on all enemies, but not until the following round.

Name: Craggle
Description: Inflicts medium earth-elemental spell damage on all enemies, but not until the following round.

Name: Critical Meltdown
Description: Prevents a single enemy from inflicting hits for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Dazzle
Description: Bedazzles all enemies for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Dazzleflash
Description: Unleashes a blinding light that lowers the accuracy of enemy attacks for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Death Dance
Description: A dance that kills all enemies instantly.

Name: Decelerate
Description: Greatly decreases the agility of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Deceleratle
Description: Decreases the agility of all enemies for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Deep Breath
Description: Inhales long and deep, raising the damage inflicted by the user's next breath attack.

Name: Defuddle
Description: Cures all allies of confusion.

Name: Demon Demeaner
Description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the demon family.

Name: Dim
Description: Greatly decreases the wisdom of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Dodgy Dance
Description: Raises the user's evasion for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Dragon Slash
Description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the dragon family.

Name: Drain Magic
Description: Aborbs some MP from a single enemy.

Name: Earthsplitter
Description: Inflicts medium earth-elemental slashing damage on all enemies.

Name: Electric Boogie
Description: A dance that inflicts extreme electrical damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Fan Dango
Description: A dance that damages enemies at random, 3 or 4 times in total. The higher the user's agility, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Fire Breath
Description: Inflicts minor fire-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

Name: Fizzle
Description: Prevents all enemies from casting spells for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Flame Breath
Description: Inflicts medium fire-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

Name: Flame Slash
Description: Inflicts minor fire-elemental slashing damage on a single enemy.

Name: Flamesplitter
Description: Inflicts minor medium-elemental slashing damage on all enemies.

Name: Freezing Blizzard
Description: Inflicts major ice-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

Name: Frenzy
Description: A risky technique that inflicts a critical hit on a single enemy or ally at random.

Name: Frizz
Description: Inflicts minor fire-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Frizzle
Description: Inflicts medium fire-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Fuddle
Description: Confuses a single enemy for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Fuddle Dance
Description: A dance that confuses all enemies for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Giga Drain Magic
Description: Absorbs MP from enemies at random, 4 times in total.

Name: Gigacross
Description: An extreme sword attack that inflicts extreme electrical damage 2 times in a row on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Gigagash
Description: Inflicts outrageous electrical damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Gigaslash
Description: Inflicts outrageous electrical damage on a single enemy. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Gobstopper
Description: Stops a single enemy from using its mouth, preventing the use of breath attacks for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Grim Breath
Description: Inflicts outrageous dark-elemental breath damage on all enemies

Name: Gust Slash
Description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental slashing damage on a single enemy.

Name: Hatchet Man
Description: Inflicts slashing damage on a single enemy. The attack has a high likelihood of missing, but an increased chance of inflicting a critical hit when it succeeds.

Name: Heal
Description: Restores 28 or more HP to a single ally.

Name: Heart Breaker
Description: Inflicts slashing damage on a single enemy and stuns it for 1 turn.

Name: Hellish Howl
Description: Lets out a bloodcurdling shout that inflicts medium damage on all enemies and occasionally stuns them for 1 turn.

Name: Hellitosis
Description: Inflicts outrageous fire-elemental breath damage on all enemies and occasionally stuns them for 1 turn.

Name: Helm Splitter
Description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally lowers its defence for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Hotstepper
Description: A dance that inflicts extreme fire-elemental damage on all enemies. The higher ther user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Hustle Dance

Name: Ice Age
Description: Inflicts outrageous ice-elemental breath damage on all enemies and occasionally stuns them for 1 turn.

Name: Inferno
Description: Inflicts major fire-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

Name: Insulate
Description: Greatly reduces the damage received from breath attacks by a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Insulatle
Description: Reduces the damage received from breath attacks by all allies for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Intense Defence
Description: Assumes an impenetrable defensive stance that reduces most damage received by 9/10. Can only be used once per battle.

Name: Kablunt
Description: Decreases the attack of all enemies for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Kaboom
Description: Inflicts major explosive spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Kaboomle
Description: Inflicts extreme explosive spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Kabuff

Name: Kacrack
Description: Inflicts major ice-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Kacrag
Description: Inflicts major earth-elemental spell damange on all enemies, but not until the following round.

Name: Kacraggle

Name: Kafrizz
Description: Inflicts major fire-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Kafrizzle
Description: Inflicts extreme fire-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Kafuddle
Description: Confuses all enemies for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Kamikazee
Description: Kills all enemies, but at the cost of the caster's life. The caster cannot be resurrected in the same battle. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Kanumb
Description: Paralyses all enemies for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Kaping
Description: Increases the wisdom of all allies for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Kasap
Description: Decreases the defence of all enemie for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Kasizz
Description: Inflicts major light-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Kasizzle
Description: Inflicts extreme light-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Kasnooze
Description: Puts all enemies to sleep for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Kasplash
Description: Inflicts major water-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Kasplashle
Description: Inflicts extreme water-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Kaswoosh
Description: Inflicts major wind-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Kaswooshle
Description: Inflicts extreme wind-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Katox
Description: Poisons all enemies. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Kazam
Description: Inflicts major dark-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Kazammle
Description: Inflicts extreme dark-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Kazap
Description: Inflicts major electrical damage on all enemies.

Name: Kazapple
Description: Inflicts extreme electrical spell damage on all enemies

Name: Kazing
Description: Is guaranteed to resurrect a fallen ally.

Name: Kerplunk
Description: Heals or resurrects all allies, including reserves, but at the cost of the caster's life. The caster cannot be resurrected in the same battle.

Name: Kerplunk Dance
Description: A dance that heals or resurrects all allies, including reserves, but at the cost of the user's life. The user cannot be resurrected in the same battle.

Name: Knuckle Sandwich
Description: Focuses strength in order to inflict heavy damage on a single enemy in the next turn, ignoring their defence attribute.

Name: Lightning
Description: Inflicts medium electrical damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Lightning Slash
Description: Inflicts minor elecrtrical slashing damage on a single enemy.

Name: Lightning Storm
Description: Inflicts outrageous electrical damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Magic Pop
Description: Uses 1/4 of remaining MP to inflict light-elemental damage on a single enemy, for a weaker rendition of a more extreme spell. The more MP the monster has at the time of casting, the greater the damage will be.

Name: Matter Scatterer
Description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the material family.

Name: Meditation
Description: Restores 300 or more HP to the user.

Name: Mercurial Thrust
Description: A punching technique that only inflicts a small amount of damage, but allows the user to attack before anyone else.

Name: Midheal
Description: Restores 76 or more HP to a single ally.

Name: Miracle Slash
Description: Inflicts slashing damage on a single enemy. Approximately half the amount of damage inflicted is restored to the user as HP. Can heal up to a maximum of 200 HP.

Name: Mirror Moves
Description: A secret technique that copies an enemy's dance moves step-for-step, effectively reflecting their dance back at them. Protects all allies once only.

Name: Mist Me
Description: Negates all damages 1 time only. Ineffective against certain attacks.

Name: Multifists
Description: A punching technique that damages enemies at random, 4 times in total

Name: Multiheal
Description: Restores 76 or more HP to all allies.

Name: Multi-Persecutter
Description: Damages all enemies. Highly effective against enemies that are asleep or confused.

Name: Multislash
Description: Inflicts slashing damage on all enemies. Enemies that are further to the right-hand side of the battlefield receive less damage.

Name: Multi-Victimiser
Description: Damages all enemies. Highly effective against enemies that are poisoned, severely poisoned or paralysed.

Name: Nature Nerfer
Description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the nature family.

Name: Numb
Description: Paralyses a single enemy for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Omniheal
Description: Restores 237 or more HP to all allies.

Name: Oomph
Description: Greatly increases the attack of a single ally for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Oomphle
Description: Increases the attack of all allies for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Parallax
Description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on a single enemy and occasionally paralyses it for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Paralysing Punch
Description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally paralyses it for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Persecutter
Description: Damages a single enemy. Higly effective against enemies that are asleep or confused.

Name: Ping
Description: Greatly increases the wisdom of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

Name: Poison Attack
Description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally poisons it.

Name: Poison Breath
Description: Exhales toxic fumes that poison all enemies.

Name: Right as Rain
Description: Performs a rainmaking ritual that invokes a healing shower in the next turn. Restores a random amount of HP to all allies.

Name: Roundhouse Kick
Description: A kicking technique that damages all enemies, regardless of their defence. Enemies that are further to the right-hand side of the battlefield receive less damage.

Name: Sandstorm
Description: Whips up a dense cloud of dust that lowers the accuracy of enemy attacks for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Sandy Sigh
Description: Whips up a cloud of dust that inflicts major earth-elemental breath damage on all enemies and occasionally lowers their accuracy for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Sap
Description: Greatly decreases the defence of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Scorch
Description: Inflicts extreme fire-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

Name: Seethe
Description: Internalises rage in order to raise the damage of the next attack. Furthermore, the user's attacks become more difficult for the enemy to dodge.

Name: Selflessness
Description: Receives all incoming attacks in place for allies for 1 round, but suffers greater damage in doing so.

Name: Shadow Blast
Description: Inflicts extreme dark-elemental damage 2 times in a row on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Shining Shot
Description: Inflicts light-elemental damage on enemies at random, 4 to 12 times in total.

Name: Sizz
Description: Inflicts minor light-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Sizzle
Description: Inflicts medium light-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Skysplitter
Description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental slashing damage on all enemies.

Name: Sleep Attack
Description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally puts it to sleep for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Slime Squisher
Description: Inflicts heavy impact damage on monsters in the slime family.

Name: Snooze
Description: Puts a single enemy to sleep for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Splash
Description: Inflicts medium water-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Splish
Description: Inflicts minor water-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Squelch
Description: Cures all allies of poison or severe poison.

Name: Stomp
Description: Inflicts medium earth-elemental damages on a single enemy. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Stone's Throw
Description: Inflicts minor earth-elemental damages on a single enemy.

Name: Sultry Dance
Description: A bewitching dance that stuns all enemies for 1 turn.

Name: Sweet Breath
Description: Lets out an exhalation of relaxation that puts all enemies to sleep for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Swoosh
Description: Inflicts medium wind-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Sword Dance
Description: A dance that damages enemies at random, 3 to 7 times in total.

Name: Tap Dance
Description: A dance that absorbs some MP from a single enemy.

Name: Thin Air
Description: Inflicts medium wind-elemental damages on a single enemy. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Thwack
Description: Kills all enemies instantly. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Tidal Wave
Description: Inflicts outrageous water-elemental damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Tingle
Description: Cures all allies of paralysis.

Name: Tongue Bashing
Description: Savagely slathers a single enemy with slimy saliva, stunning it and reducing its defence attribute to 1.

Name: Tongue Lashing
Description: Slathers a single enemy with simy saliva, stunning it and lowering its defence.

Name: Tox
Description: Poisons a single enemy. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Undead Undoer
Description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the undead family.

Name: Victimiser
Description: Damages a single enemy. Highly effective against enemies that are poisoned, severly poisoned or paralysed.

Name: War Cry
Description: An ear-popping shout that stuns all enemies for 1 turn.

Name: Wave of Relief
Description: Cures of allies of their status ailments.

Name: Weird Dance
Description: A dance that decreases the MP of a single enemy.

Name: Whack
Description: Kills a single enemy instantly. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

Name: Wind Sickles
Description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental damages on a single enemy.

Name: Withering Look
Description: Shoots a beam from the eyes that inflicts extreme damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

Name: Woosh
Description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

Name: Zam
Description: Inflicts minor dark-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Zammle
Description: Inflicts medium dark-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

Name: Zap
